faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to resolve complaints?
faq.a1: Response times vary by category. Road issues typically take 3-7 days, water issues 1-3 days, and garbage collection 24-48 hours.
faq.a2: Yes, we prioritize your privacy. Only necessary information is shared with relevant authorities for complaint resolution.
faq.q3: Can I track my complaint status?
faq.a3: Absolutely! You can track your complaint status in real-time through the Status section.
faq.q4: What types of issues can I report?
faq.a4: You can report roads, water, sewage, garbage, street lights, public health, infrastructure, and other civic issues.
faq.q5: How do I use the camera feature?
faq.a5: Simply click on 'Add Photos' and allow camera access. You can take 3-5 photos to support your complaint.
faq.q6: Can I edit my complaint after submission?
faq.a6: You can edit complaints only while they are in 'Pending' status. Once reviewed, editing is not allowed.
